channel.title: Climate and Society
channel.description: Recent content on Climate and Society

item.title: Building Bridges Over Warming Waters
item.description: This summer, fisherman on the cape encountered a surprising catch. Traps hauled aboard were full of lifeless lobsters. Upon further investigation, this die-off was attributed to changes in the oceanâ€™s temperature, more specifically, an ocean heat wave. But this is more than just a story about ocean heat waves. This is a story about the scientists who study them, the fishermen who deal with the consequences, and the extraordinary fleet that brought these two groups together.
